response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its intrinsic worth to you is approximately $800,000. Considering this, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty, personalized setup assistance, and a dedicated support package to ensure seamless integration into your business processes. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you and contributing to your business growth.", "product_price": 950000}
